message.raw: Made child processes daemonic, so they quit when the parent does (ie when BLACS quits completely). Connected gtk.main_quit to the close button of the main window in the demo code to simulate this. Now when you  click the close button, everything actually cleanly quits, no dangling threads or orphaned processes.
